issue.title: [CI] Fedora cron jobs are failing because of wrong fedora version
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7128](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7128). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The requested fedora version is 10 (Debian) instead of 29: https://github.com/apache/arrow/runs/299223601

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7128?focusedCommentId=16972353) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5808
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5808>

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7128?focusedCommentId=17010207) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Is this resolved?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7128?focusedCommentId=17010852) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Yes, it looks like it: https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/4634c89fc77f70fb5b5d035d6172263a4604da82/checks?check_suite_id=389869709
